code-runner.executorMap.cpp: if [[ "$dir" == *".sandbox"* ]]; then  cd "$dir" &&  clang++ -O2 -fsanitize=undefined               -fsanitize=address              -std=c++20               "$fileName" -o "$fileNameWithoutExt.trash" &&  ./"$fileNameWithoutExt.trash";elif [[ "$dir" == *"my-async-framework/tests"* ]]; then  cd "$workspaceRoot/my-async-framework" &&  cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON -DBUILD_TESTING=ON -DLOG_LEVEL=2 -DSANITIZER=address,undefined &&  cmake --build build &&  cd build &&  ctest;else  cd "$workspaceRoot/my-async-framework" &&  cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON -DBUILD_TESTING=ON -DLOG_LEVEL=0 &&  cmake --build build &&  cmake --install build --prefix ~/local/my-async-framework &&  cd "$workspaceRoot/services/simple-tcp-server" &&  cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=~/local/my-async-framework -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON &&  cmake --build build &&  ./build/SimpleTCPServer;fi
